DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect 10 week mindfulness training program -- without therapist-support -- treatment anxiety . Effects depression , quality life , insomnia symptom also study .
DOC.brief_title: An Internet-administered , Mindfulness Training Program Treatment Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: Previous research provide evidence thesis training mindfulness decrease symptom anxiety depression . This study examine effect 10 week mindfulness training program -- without therapist-support -- treatment anxiety . Effects depression , quality life , insomnia symptom also study .
DOC.criteria: Satisfy DSMIV criterion anxiety disorder Living Sweden able read Swedish Access computer internet connection Currently receive psychological treatment Nonstable use psychoactive medication Deemed suicidal Deemed suffer psychological disorder , e.g . psychosis , bipolarity etc .
